Combine the cake mix, milk, oil, instant pudding mix, eggs, chocolate extract, vanilla extract, and almond extract in a large bowl. 
Mix with an electric mixer for a minute at a low speed. Turn the mixer on a medium speed and beat for 2 additional minutes.

How to prevent cat allergies 
Consult your doctor. 
When you suffer from cat allergies, talk to your doctor about the severity of your symptoms. If the allergy is severe, your doctor may recommend moving your pet to a new home.

OPTIONS:
- If the symptoms are mild, your doctor may recommend lifestyle changes or medications. The type of drug and the dosage for you by your doctor will vary depending on your particular case, so always follow your doctor's and the manufacturer's instructions for each medication.
- At the very least, your pet should be properly medicated. Symptoms of cat allergies include fever, pain or swelling, insomnia, urinary tract infections, abscess, and nasal cold sores.
- Changes in behavior or behavioral patterns may indicate underlying medical problems. If your pet has recently become sick and lost a lot of weight, he may be making a concerted effort to get vaccinated against the virus.
- This will help prolong the time your cat is exposed to any allergens. Allergy dermatitis is a condition where your cat's immune system is disrupted by an allergic reaction.
output: If the symptoms are mild, your doctor may recommend lifestyle changes or medications. The type of drug and the dosage for you by your doctor will vary depending on your particular case, so always follow your doctor's and the manufacturer's instructions for each medication.

How to go from dating to being friends again 
Agree to give each other space at first. 
For the first weeks or months after a breakup, space is key. If you try to jump straight into friendship, this is likely to backfire as you'll both be too emotional.

OPTIONS:
- Agree to a set period of time to cease or minimize contact so feelings of attraction, romance, and resentment can fade. The timeframe necessary is somewhat subjective.
- Time is of the essence, and you want time to come naturally. Make sure that you're willing to keep talking to each other so you can gradually separate from each other.
- Be respectful towards one another, even if it's something as minor as kissing or having meetings in the afternoon. Use this time to build fresh memories.
- The longer time you can be around each other after the breakup, the harder it'll be to stay friends and both of you will have to accept the situation. It's best for both of you to let things cool off just a little before you're ready to talk again.
output: Agree to a set period of time to cease or minimize contact so feelings of attraction, romance, and resentment can fade. The timeframe necessary is somewhat subjective.

How to change the subject in a conversation 
Be prepared! 
If you know you'll be going into a situation where you'll be talking to a lot of strangers, think of 2-3 topics for small talk before you get there. 
Choose topics that are of interest to many people-hobbies, sports, and tech gadgets are a good place to start. 
Focus on the other person.

OPTIONS:
- Since people like to talk about themselves, focusing on the other person can make it easier to change the subject. Choose a topic that you know is important to your conversation partner.
- There are lots of things that need to be talked about. Try to make an effort to always be there.
- Make sure that everyone has at least one thing to talk about. It's okay if you're nervous about how the conversation will run if you started it with something mundane.
- Always make your mind off another's fears or worries and focus on the person you want to talk to. This will clear your mind so you can make the most of the conversation.
output: Since people like to talk about themselves, focusing on the other person can make it easier to change the subject. Choose a topic that you know is important to your conversation partner.

How to stop being afraid of being loved or falling in love 
Think about why you are afraid to fall in love or be loved. 
The first step in dealing with your issues with loving and/or being loved is to identify the fear that is holding you back. There are many different types of fear that can cause a person to fear loving someone or being loved.

OPTIONS:
- Consider your feelings and try to figure out what your main concern is. What are you afraid might happen if you allow yourself to love or be loved? Try writing about your feelings to explore them in more depth.
- The first thing you can do is find the type of fear that is causing your fear, and work through it by identifying what it is that makes you afraid to fall in love. Identify the trigger or reason that triggers your fears.
- Determining which kind of fear you may be facing can be tricky. If the fear of being loved is to prevent you from becoming in love, then you may have phobias about the person or the relationship, just like everyone else.
- If you have a fear of rejection or being loved, you may have different personality mechanisms that make you afraid to get in love. Have a knowledge or practice about the common kinds of fear that may be holding you back.
output: Consider your feelings and try to figure out what your main concern is. What are you afraid might happen if you allow yourself to love or be loved? Try writing about your feelings to explore them in more depth.

How to hire " at will " employees 
Check your state law. 
In the united states , 49 out of 50 states presume that an employee is an " at will " employee. The one exception is montana.

OPTIONS:
- If you work in any state but montana, then you can assume that a court would consider all employees " at will " unless you modify the " at will " status with a contract. Typically, employment contracts are express, written contracts.
- Alaska, for example, includes sba laws, which prohibit employees from firing someone who does not have a driving record. Furthermore, montana prohibits employing an employee without a driving record.
- In a majority of states, this would be equivalent to applying for legal separation. Under federal law, this is only slightly more typical.
- Only 40 states require a " at will " employee. Make sure to check your state law.
output: If you work in any state but montana, then you can assume that a court would consider all employees " at will " unless you modify the " at will " status with a contract. Typically, employment contracts are express, written contracts.

How to identify a black widow spider 
Look for red markings on female black widows. 
Female black widows are best known for the red spots on their bellies. A black widow may have a connected red hourglass shape on the underbelly, or two triangles that don't touch in a slight hourglass shape.

OPTIONS:
- One type of black widow has a row of reddish dots instead of the hourglass shape that the species is known for. There is a lot of variation in the coloring of black widows.
- You might also find white, cream, or gray markings, usually around the anus. Female black widows will have two clusters of red and black markings that are half on top and half off on top.
- Female black widows typically grow to be at least 1 foot (0.3 m) at the base of their tubular outermost spindles. Note black widows may have black markings on the pads of their feet.
- The female black widow is perhaps the nastiest of the male black widows. Along the underbelly of the female black widow, the intact serrations may have separate red stripes or small black markings.
output: One type of black widow has a row of reddish dots instead of the hourglass shape that the species is known for. There is a lot of variation in the coloring of black widows.

How to treat ckd 
Eat a healthy diet. 
Diet is very important for managing ckd, as certain foods are harder on your kidneys. In general, your diet should consist of lean protein options, vegetables, and fruits.

OPTIONS:
- However, you'll also need to follow specific recommendations about which foods to avoid, as well as how much protein you should consume. For example, red meat, eggs, dairy, and fish are all hard on your kidneys.
- Always eat foods high in fiber, calcium, and protein, such as beans, oats, and lean cuts of meat, such as chicken, tofu, fish, and potatoes. You can also stay more hydrated by drinking between two and three glasses of water daily.
- Aside from protein, you should also eat more fruits and vegetables, such as grapes, apples, and brussels sprouts. Foods high in omega 3 fatty acids include apples, oranges, dark leafy green vegetables like broccoli and overripe apples, and meats like poultry, seafood, and eggs.
- It's also important to be of a healthy weight, depending on your age, gender, and sex. In addition to calories, don't let snacking unbalance your diet.
output: However, you'll also need to follow specific recommendations about which foods to avoid, as well as how much protein you should consume. For example, red meat, eggs, dairy, and fish are all hard on your kidneys.

How to respond when a gay friend comes out of the closet 
Be civil regardless of your beliefs. 
Not everyone shares the same beliefs and it's possible that you may have reservations about homosexuality. While you have every right to maintain any set of beliefs you wish, don't hold your friend to the standard of your belief system.
OPTIONS:
- Even if you don't understand, try to appreciate the fear and stress involved in coming out to you. Your friend is still your friend, regardless of your feelings about homosexuality.
- Acknowledge the fact that he or she just went through a long and troubled process and is doing this out of anger. If someone comes out, be prepared to listen to their comments.
- Doing so can cause tension and excitement in your interactions, which can be disastrous for friendships. Whatever your beliefs are, don't keep them in the dark.
- Try to understand his or her perspective and emotions without judgment or unwelcome criticism. If a friend comes out of the closet despite his or her beliefs, accept the fact that it's rude and hurtful.
output: Even if you don't understand, try to appreciate the fear and stress involved in coming out to you. Your friend is still your friend, regardless of your feelings about homosexuality.
